title: PBE account suddenly disabled?!
body: so I had my PBE account for almost a year now, tried to log in after this latest patch and all of a sudden my account Is disabled? username is jakeshadow and in game name is ShouldITryNow, can I get some help please ? ;/

replies.body:
My account was the same i tried to log in and it was dissabled 
 my account name is eXoudOne1

I wasn't able to locate a PBE tied to the account you're posting from.  Hit us up in an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our team can help locate and recover the correct account.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can!
